mention.text: the world 's largest solar power plant near here Wednesday
the first of 75 firefighters and 25 pieces of equipment
Capt. Sharon Sellers of the San Bernardino County
on-scene at 9:16 a.m. and a second explosion
an inmate from the Boron Federal Prison Camp who was pressed into service to help fight the fire
LUZ International Ltd. of Los Angeles
Capt. Clyde Gamma of the California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection
